items.summary: Audit `frontend/src/data/loanOffersData.ts` and `frontend/src/components/TopLoanOffersBanner.tsx` to confirm all 6 real affiliate links are assigned to offer cards and rendered on the page. The 6 links are: (1) https://cd.leadfinv.com/?a=294697&c=294173&co=358739&mt=5 — display name '24/7 Credit Loan (up to $5,000)'; (2) https://cd.leadfinv.com/?a=294697&c=373383&co=358739&mt=5 — display name 'Wizzay (up to $5,000)'; (3) https://www.hotloanstoday.com?id=vMWPxIKBq9DH2QsDiJNtlIkIwmcF00oXN-523fdHkCM.&subId=[SUB_ID_VALUE]&subId2=[SUB_ID2_VALUE]&subId3=[clickId]&firstName=[firstName]&lastName=[lastName]&email=[email] — display name 'Hot Loans Today'; (4) https://www.honestloans.net?id=vMWPxIKBq9DH2QsDiJNtlIkIwmcF00oXN-523fdHkCM.&subId=[SUB_ID_VALUE]&subId2=[SUB_ID2_VALUE]&subId3=[clickId]&firstName=[firstName]&lastName=[lastName]&email=[email] — display name 'Honest Loans'; (5) https://wedebeek.com/click?pid=13236&offer_id=20435 — display name 'NextDayPersonalLoan'; (6) https://wedebeek.com/click?pid=13236&offer_id=20370 — display name 'EverdayLoans'. If any of these 6 links are missing, add or reassign offer cards so that every link appears at least once — distributed across the TopLoanOffersBanner and/or category loan offer sections. Links (3) and (4) must have [firstName], [lastName], and [email] tokens dynamically substituted via `affiliateUrlBuilder.ts` using the submitted lead form data.
